rules_text:
Menace
Escape {2}{U}{B}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
Tethered Soul Knight escapes with a flying counter on it.

rules_text2:
Choose one –
• Copy target instant or sorcery spell.
• Prevent all damage target source would deal this turn.
